ats.summary: Results-driven software engineer with 5+ years of experience in developing, testing, and maintaining web applications. Proficient in JavaScript, React, and Node.js, with a track record of delivering high-quality code and collaborating effectively in agile environments.
ats.skills: JavaScript, React, Node.js, Python, SQL, Docker, TypeScript, AWS, CI/CD, Agile Methodologies

bullets: Developed and maintained client-side features for a high-traffic e-commerce platform using React and TypeScript, improving user engagement by 15%.
Collaborated with product teams to define and implement new functionalities, resulting in a 20% reduction in cart abandonment.
Built and consumed RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express, improving data retrieval times by 30%.
Assisted in the development of a customer relationship management (CRM) system using JavaScript and SQL.
Fixed over 100 bugs and improved application performance by 10% through systematic code reviews and testing.

ats.summary: Product Manager with over 8 years of experience leading cross-functional teams to launch and scale products in B2B SaaS. Expert in roadmap planning, user-centric design, and data-driven decision-making to achieve business goals and enhance user satisfaction.
ats.skills: Product Roadmapping, Agile Methodologies, Scrum, JIRA, Confluence, User Research, A/B Testing, Market Analysis, Competitive Analysis, Go-to-Market Strategy

bullets: Drove product strategy and roadmap for a flagship analytics platform, resulting in a 40% year-over-year revenue growth.
Led a team of 5 engineers and 2 designers to launch a new mobile-first dashboard, increasing monthly active users by 25%.
Defined and analyzed key metrics to guide product development, leading to a 30% improvement in user retention.
Managed the entire product lifecycle for a new integration marketplace, from ideation to launch, onboarding 50+ partners in the first year.
Conducted 100+ user interviews and surveys to identify pain points and opportunities, shaping the v2 product direction.
Collaborated with marketing to develop a go-to-market strategy that exceeded lead generation targets by 20%.

projects.name: Academic Repository
projects.impact: Enabled 50+ students to access lecture notes online, reducing search time by 40%.

leadership.contribution: Organized weekly meetings and workshops for 50+ members.

skillBased.summary: An analytical and driven student pursuing a Master's in Artificial Intelligence, with hands-on project experience in machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing. Eager to contribute to innovative AI research and development.

skills.technical: Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, Pandas, SQL
skills.soft: Analytical Thinking, Research, Collaboration, Technical Writing

projects.impact: Developed a model to classify movie reviews with 92% accuracy, outperforming baseline models by 15%.
